remarks.para: Except for extended overwater operations, may be inoperative provided any unserviceable unit(s) in excess of those required by FAR are removed from the compartment.

numlitem.para: For extended overwater flights at a horizontal distance of more than 50NM from the nearest shoreline, two life rafts are required.
See Ops Specs paragraph A-13 for exempted routes and qualifying conditions for exemption.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "LIFE RAFT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
